trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Henderson
There were 3 other sightings in Henderson on or around April 10th 2008
Summary: bright star like dot in the sky moved like nothing ive seen before
divs: sighting detailson the morning of 4\10\08 i was on my way to meet a friend. it was easiest for her to spot me if i parked in a gas station, so i did. i was parked on the south east corner facing the west, plain view of oncoming traffic. i was looking for my friend to drive up when i decided to look at the sky. thats when a bright star caught my complete attention. the star was at a norht west position and it moved slowly like a ballon. thats what i thought it was a shiny ballon but then it stopped. and held its position for a couple of minutes then it begun to move again, i did noticed something else lingering around it but it was to blurry to make out a shape. the ufo then bagan on a straight south movement but in a slow motion pace. then it started getting smaller and smaller thats when i figured it was leaving our atmosphere, it moved up very slow the ufo began to get smaller and smaller and one thing the brightness never faded untill i could not see it any more. i know it was a ufo, i have never seen a ballon or helicopter or plane do anything of what seen that day. specialy it holding its position for a while with out flickering or fading or moving and it could no be a sattelite that fell into our atmosphere then shot back out. i originaly placed a call and left a message and then whent on this site minutes after on my blackberry but was unable to submit a complete report. i now have a home computer and am able to submit a report. im impressed by this sighting but i want to see more.... this is addicting!
